All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountCreationService
Provides the service to create and add a new user to the database
AccountCreationUI
Displays the user interface to get user input for account creation
AdminPriceUI
Displays the user interface to get Admin input for price changes/testing to be made
AdminSessionUI
Displays the user interface to get Admin input for session changes
AdminUI
Displays the user interface to show all the available functionalities provided for Admin users
AgeGroup
Each available age group for movie ticket booking
BookingController
Manages the logic for a single booking session
BookingInfo
Represents the booking information acquired when a customer books a movie ticket.
BookingUI
Displays the user interface to get user input for booking a movie ticket
BookSeatUI
Displays the user interface to get user input for booking their desired seat
Cinema
Represents a cinema, where there are multiple of in a cineplex
CinemaClass
Each available cinema class for movie ticket booking
Cineplex
Represents a cineplex
CineplexLocation
Each available cineplex location for movie ticket booking
CustomerReviewUI
Displays the user interface to get user input when leaving a movie review
DateI
Represent the format of how a date will be store
FileAccessController
Handles the initial file read/write for file generation
HolidayUI
Ability to save/delete/view date that is store in the database.
InvalidSearchKey
Exception to indicate that the input search key was invalid
LoginUI
Shows the user login interface on the console and processes their inputs
Movie
Represents a movie that can be shown in the cinema.
MovieRating
Each available movie audience rating for a movie
MovieStatus
Each available movie showing status for a movie
MovieType
Each available movie showing type for a movie
PriceCalculator
Provides the service for the calculation of ticket prices
PriceController
Manages all the logic involving the searching of a particular movie (based on several categories)
PriceList
Represents the pricing information regarding ticket pricing
PriceModifier
Stores the pricing information provided during the booking process
Review
Stores the reviews set by users for a Movie
SearchController
Manages all the logic involving the searching of a particular movie (based on several categories)
SearchService
Provides the service for the searching of movie by a particular metric
SearchUI
Displays the user interface to show the searching functionalities provided
Security
Provides the security services needed to ensure that the passwords were properly protected
Session
Represents a single cinema session where a movie will be played
SessionController
Manages all the logic involving the sessions for a particular movie booking
SortController
Manages the allocation of sorting tasks depending on the user input acquired from Boundary.SortListUI
SortListUI
Displays the user interface to show the sorting/filtering functionalities provided
SortService
Provides the service to sort a list of movies Inherited by several sub classes to perform different sorting algorithms (strategy pattern)
TimeDateController
Get date, time.
User
Represents a user of the application
UserAlreadyExistsException
Exception to indicate that the user account that the current user is trying to register as already exists
UserType
To differentiate between users and grant separate access rights
UserUI
Displays the user interface to show all the available functionalities provided for Customers as well as 'Guests'
